AuxEcoSys: Introduced Upland Vegetation - Perennial Grassland and Forbland
bMIKIx-s6.memHandModelNotes:
Select large streams (would show up as open water?) -Matt E.-Buffered lg. streams, rivers and bottomland/riparian forest by 1km keep all habitat types within this buffer.

Changed INTO flowing and open water buffers from 0m to 500m. Removed brackish/salt water map unit selection. MJR 28 January 2008.
